{{Actor| | type = Map spot | name = Growl | class = HereticSoundSequence7 | game = Heretic | doomednum = 1206 }}[[Classes]]: [[Classes:SoundSequence|SoundSequence]]→<u>HereticSoundSequence7</u>
Plays sound sequence number 6 from the list of Heretic's environmental sound sequences.
==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR <u>HereticSoundSequence7</u> : {{Class|SoundSequence}} { {{Property|Args}} 6 }
==== [[SNDSEQ]] definition ==== :AFX_Growl environment 6 slot [[HereticAmbience]] playuntildone world/amb12 end
